title: ROMEO - Gay Chat & Dating
summary: Chat with guys in your area now. Make friends, find dates or fall in love.
description: ROMEO is the ultimate gay social network. With more free options than any other gay dating app, it's the best way to make new friends or have casual fun. Get the free ROMEO App now and chat with millions of gay guys, nearby and worldwide. Create your profile and start chatting within minutes!10 features you'll LOVE:● A fresh and intuitive design● Unrestricted list of guys online● Free unlimited chat● Lots of pictures and profile stats● Free powerful search options● See new guys in your area● See who recently came online● Hide your real GPS position● Set your location to anywhere in the world● Free push notifications● Share your private pics for a limited timeThe ROMEO App is brought to you by PLANETROMEO, also known as GAYROMEO. PLANETROMEO is the ultimate dating app and social network for the gay, bi and transgender communities. We celebrate diversity and support our global LGBT+ family. With our apps and website, we want to provide a friendly online space for gay guys to hang out, chat, meet and date.PLANETROMEODATES  FRIENDS  LOVE● Website version also available● ROMEO App is for guys aged 18 and over.Thanks for considering the free ROMEO App! We'd love to hear from you guys, so don't hesitate to leave us a review!Happy dating!
descriptionHTML:
ROMEO is the ultimate gay social network. With more free options than any other gay dating app, it's the best way to make new friends or have casual fun. Get the free ROMEO App now and chat with millions of gay guys, nearby and worldwide. Create your profile and start chatting within minutes!

10 features you'll LOVE:

● A fresh and intuitive design
● Unrestricted list of guys online
● Free unlimited chat
● Lots of pictures and profile stats
● Free powerful search options
● See new guys in your area
● See who recently came online
● Hide your real GPS position
● Set your location to anywhere in the world
● Free push notifications
● Share your private pics for a limited time

The ROMEO App is brought to you by PLANETROMEO, also known as GAYROMEO. PLANETROMEO is the ultimate dating app and social network for the gay, bi and transgender communities. We celebrate diversity and support our global LGBT+ family. With our apps and website, we want to provide a friendly online space for gay guys to hang out, chat, meet and date.

PLANETROMEO
DATES FRIENDS LOVE

● Website version also available
● ROMEO App is for guys aged 18 and over.

Thanks for considering the free ROMEO App! We'd love to hear from you guys, so don't hesitate to leave us a review!

Happy dating!
comments: Used to be fine, but it's getting worse! Only 3-5 profiles ( under activity) available in my area, notification unable to prompt when the apps is closed, unable to delete message at times.... Should bring back the "Online"

The new update very limit of showing guys in DISTANCE section, while before I could see as many as and as far as I could scroll down. It's pretty disappointing. And please bring back the function which can search guy by location.
Way too many fake profiles pretending to be army guys trying to scam you.
It's a good app. Would prefer to see those who have visited my profile in the last few days though
Problem solving plz my account upgrade plz my account in block
